column4: can i install ubuntu over top of my current debian sarge install??? i have my / on one disk, and my /home and /storage each on other disks, i shouldnt have a problem installing ubuntu on my / after formatting right?
but i can still keep my /home and /storage correct?
i have upgraded ubuntu over sarge before it was stable.
and you can also loose all the information if you don't install ubuntu, but simply format /home and /storage ;-)
